meta.description: Complete component catalog of Dev Showcase — live preview, props, variants and usage examples.

hero.title: Project components

primitives.title: Base components

button.description: Button with variants (default, outline, ghost, destructive), sizes (sm, lg, icon) and asChild support.

badge.name: Badge

input.name: Input
input.description: Input field with consistent styles, accessible focus and icon support.

card.name: Card
card.description: Container with header, content and footer — base for content and feature cards.

separator.name: Separator
separator.description: Horizontal or vertical visual divider based on Radix UI.

tabs.name: Tabs
tabs.description: Tab navigation with Radix UI — accessible List, Trigger and Content.

layout.title: Page structure
layout.description: Components that define the visual structure of pages.

heroSection.name: HeroSection
heroSection.description: Extensible hero with badge, title, description, warning, slots for CTA, stats and social links.

sectionNav.description: Sticky navigation between page sections with scroll spy and active highlight.

sectionDivider.name: SectionDivider

feedback.title: Feedback and states
feedback.description: Components for loading, errors, animations and status.

footer.name: Footer
footer.description: Footer with social links, secondary navigation and author information.

featureCard.name: FeatureCard
featureCard.description: Card for feature listing with icon, title, description, tags and link.

stepCard.name: StepCard
stepCard.description: Numbered card for step-by-step with icon, title and description.

codeBlock.name: CodeBlock
codeBlock.description: Code block with syntax highlighting, copy button and horizontal scroll.

viewSource.name: ViewSource
viewSource.description: Expandable link to view component source code.
